column4: In the future, decline giving your father Windows support when he need it. Until he upgrade. ;o
If I do that he will format and reinstall... he already did when I was in the uk...
Meh. If he think he's better off with that OS, let him go. :'(
yeah, and for what he needs, I think he is... you know, it's hard for him to change, 70 yo
